pages.text: §5Nyxathel, the Shadow Lord§r, grants power to those who dare embrace the darkness. This ritual requires rare materials from the Nether's depths and opens your soul to shadow magic.$(br2)The most dangerous of the divine rituals, it may be demanded by Nyxathel himself.
Place §8Soul Sand§r in the brazier as the ritual focus. Arrange the dark components on stone hands around the brazier, then activate with a §dNether Star§r.

pages.title: Shadow Components
pages.text: §lStone Hand Contents:§r$(br)• 4x §8Obsidian§r - unbreakable darkness$(br)• 2x §7Wither Skeleton Skull§r - death's embrace$(br)• 2x §8Soul Soil§r - essence of shadows$(br2)This ritual opens your soul to the shadow realm - proceed with caution.
